issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Errors are logged from CloudFormation workflow workers on shutdown of the eucalyptus-cloud service:

{code}
Thu Oct 30 10:56:48 2014 ERROR [workflow:SWF Decider CloudFormationTaskList 1] [com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.common.client.Config$2.uncaughtException(Config.java):184] Uncaught exception in decision worker SWF Decider CloudFormationTaskList 1/1569
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Connection pool shut down
        at org.apache.http.pool.AbstractConnPool.lease(AbstractConnPool.java:167)
        at org.apache.http.pool.AbstractConnPool.lease(AbstractConnPool.java:199)
        at org.apache.http.impl.conn.PoolingClientConnectionManager.requestConnection(PoolingClientConnectionManager.java:188)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor359.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
        at com.amazonaws.http.conn.ClientConnectionManagerFactory$Handler.invoke(ClientConnectionManagerFactory.java:62)
        at com.amazonaws.http.conn.$Proxy172.requestConnection(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultRequestDirector.execute(DefaultRequestDirector.java:448)
        at org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient.execute(AbstractHttpClient.java:906)
        at org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient.execute(AbstractHttpClient.java:805)
        at com.amazonaws.http.AmazonHttpClient.executeHelper(AmazonHttpClient.java:380)
        at com.amazonaws.http.AmazonHttpClient.execute(AmazonHttpClient.java:229)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient.invoke(AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient.java:3144)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient.pollForDecisionTask(AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient.java:2618)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.DecisionTaskPoller.poll(DecisionTaskPoller.java:171)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.DecisionTaskPoller.access$000(DecisionTaskPoller.java:31)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.DecisionTaskPoller$DecisionTaskIterator.<init>(DecisionTaskPoller.java:44)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.DecisionTaskPoller.pollAndProcessSingleTask(DecisionTaskPoller.java:197)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.GenericWorker$PollServiceTask.run(GenericWorker.java:94)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
{code}
fields.summary: CloudFormation workflow worker shutdown errors logged

comments.body:
[~tony]/[~sjones]:

Verified this has been fixed.  Followed the verification testing mentioned above by [~sjones].

*Steps*

# Source cloud admin credentials on [Group #1 cloud|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard#Euca4.1QualityDashboard-Group#1]
# Disabled cloudformation service
{code}
$ euca-modify-service -s DISABLED API_12.cloudformation
RESPONSE true

 euca-describe-services
SERVICE	user-api          	API_12    	API_12               	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:user-api:API_12/
SERVICE	autoscaling       	API_12    	API_12.autoscaling   	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:autoscaling:API_12.autoscaling/
SERVICE	cloudformation    	API_12    	API_12.cloudformation	DISABLED	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudFormation	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/
SERVICE	cloudwatch        	API_12    	API_12.cloudwatch    	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudwatch:API_12.cloudwatch/
SERVICE	compute           	API_12    	API_12.compute       	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:compute:API_12.compute/
SERVICE	euare             	API_12    	API_12.euare         	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:euare:API_12.euare/
SERVICE	imaging           	API_12    	API_12.imaging       	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:imaging:API_12.imaging/
SERVICE	loadbalancing     	API_12    	API_12.loadbalancing 	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:loadbalancing:API_12.loadbalancing/
SERVICE	objectstorage     	API_12    	API_12.objectstorage 	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:objectstorage:API_12.objectstorage/
SERVICE	simpleworkflow    	API_12    	API_12.simpleworkflow	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/SimpleWorkflow	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:simpleworkflow:API_12.simpleworkflow/

SERVICE	reporting         	bootstrap 	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.5.12/

SERVICE	imagingbackend    	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/ImagingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imagingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.5.12/
SERVICE	dns               	eucalyptus	10.111.5.12          	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.12:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.5.12/

SERVICE	cluster           	one       	CC_13                	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.13:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:CC_13/

SERVICE	storage           	two       	SC_23                	ENABLED 	86  	http://10.111.5.23:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:storage:SC_23/

# Waited for a couple of minutes, then enabled the service
{code}

RESPONSE true

$ euca-describe-services

# Checked cloud-error.log, and saw the following
{code}

hu Jan 8 11:31:30 2015 ERROR [Topology:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:Topology::external/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#14] [com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.doTopologyChange(Topology.java):1302] CHECK:null  arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/ ENABLED->ENABLED=ENABLED [Transition request state=ENABLED rejected because of an ongoing transition: State:name=arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/:state=ENABLED:mark=true:transition=TRANSITION arn:euca:bootstrap:API_12:cloudformation:API_12.cloudformation/ #481636 DISABLE ActiveTransition name=DISABLE from=ENABLED/false to=DISABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=DISABLE id=481636 startTime=Thu Jan 08 11:31:21 PST 2015]
